mapper.insert: insert into performer (group_name, leader_name, member_num, leader_phone, perform_num, perfo_work, user_id) values (#{group_name}, #{leader_name}, #{member_num}, #{leader_phone}, #{perform_num}, #{perfo_work}, #{user_id})
mapper.update: update performer set group_name = #{group_name}, leader_name = #{leader_name}, member_num = #{member_num}, leader_phone = #{leader_phone}, perform_num = #{perform_num}, perfo_work = #{perfo_work} where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select h.hall_name, h.address1, h.address2, h.hall_id from hall h join like_hall l on l.hall_id = h.hall_id join user u on l.user_id = u.user_id where l.status = 'Y' and u.user_id = #{id}

select h.hall_name, h.address1, h.address2, h.hall_id, date_format(rd.reserve_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reserve_date, rd.reserve_time, r.reserve_id from hall h join reservation r on h.hall_id = r.hall_id join reserve_date rd on r.reserve_id = rd.reserve_id where r.reserve_status = 'Y' and r.user_id = #{user_id}

select h.hall_name, h.address1, h.address2, h.hall_id, date_format(rd.reserve_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reserve_date, rd.reserve_time, r.estimate, u.name, u.phone from hall h join reservation r on r.hall_id = h.hall_id join reserve_date rd on r.reserve_id = rd.reserve_id join user u on u.user_id = r.user_id where r.reserve_id = #{reserve_id};

select h.hall_name, date_format(rd.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as start_date, date_format(rd.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as end_date, rd.start_time, rd.end_time, h.hall_id, r.reserve_id from hall h join reservation r on h.hall_id = r.hall_id join reserve_date rd on r.reserve_id = rd.reserve_id where r.user_id = #{user_id} and r.reserve_status = 'Y' and end_date < CURDATE() and r.write_review = 'N';
select r.review_content, r.rating, r.create_date, h.hall_name, h.hall_id from review r join hall h on h.hall_id = r.hall_id where r.user_id = #{user_id};
mapper.insert: insert into review(review_content, user_id, hall_id, rating, create_date) values(#{review_content}, #{user_id}, #{hall_id}, #{rating}, #{create_date})
